document.full_text: president bashar al-assad is in a quandary as the challenge to his autocratic rule grows in the streets of syria: more concessions could signal weakness, but harsher repression risks radicalizing a growing opposition.
document.title: analysis: syria's assad torn between repression and reform
lines_and_colors: president bashar al-assad is in a quandary as the challenge to his autocratic rule grows in the streets of syria: more concessions could signal weakness, but harsher repression risks radicalizing a growing opposition.
